item.title: Movie Analysis: The Boy and the Heron
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: Yesterday I’ve seen “The Boy and the Heron”, or with its original japanese title “How Do You Live?” (君たちはどう生きるか). A grandious movie full of symbols, with much room for interpretation.

item.title: Media Coverage of a Mystic in 2022
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: The Indian guru Bhagwan - also later known as Osho - has been one of the most widely known mystics of our time. After his death in January 1990, suddenly his media coverage seems to rise again. An investigation in numbers…

item.title: Our thoughts are not free
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: Opposite to the traditional German folk song “Die Gedanken sind frei” (All thoughts are free) I claim otherwise. I will explain this in strictly logical terms, giving examples and scientific evidence, while the insight itself only came after long meditation.
